notes: Luxury modern apartment with high-end finishes including herringbone hardwood floors, recessed lighting, stone accent walls, and an open-plan living area with modern kitchen. Excellent natural light from floor-to-ceiling windows. For baby safety, the large windows appear to have secure frames but balcony access should be verified; no visible stairs or sharp corners in the living areas. Very spacious at 67 ping with clean, move-in ready condition.
